rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0001
rows.name:
The Avaritia Trade Guild has become
quite respectable, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0002
rows.name:
It's stable even without Chairman
Bahn, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Once you've reached the pinnacle of development,
you should aim to become a shop owner, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Complete requests, increase the product lineup,
and then buy everything in the shop, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0005
rows.name:
If you do that, you'll be able to buy the
rights to become an owner, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350212_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Aim to be the number one owner
in Avaritia, mo!
